name: tiny-node-eventemitter
author: DevMiner <devminer@devminer.xyz>
description: Tiny portable node:events compliant strictly-typed EventEmitter implementation

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:js
scripts.build:types: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly -p tsconfig.json && cp dist/index.d.ts dist/index.d.cts && cp dist/index.d.ts.map dist/index.d.dts.map
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && changeset publish
